Class SmartDashboardPacketFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SmartDashboardPacketFactory

public class SmartDashboardPacketFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Creates raw data frames to be sent across the network for SmartDashboard

Author:
pmalmsten

announce

public static void announce(java.io.DataOutputStream s,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            byte type,
                            byte id)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Announces a new field to the client GUI

Parameters:
name - The name of the new field
type - The type of data the field should accept
id - The numerical id of the field
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getAnnounceLength

public static int getAnnounceLength(java.lang.String name)
Returns the expected length of an announcement frame.

Parameters:
name - The name of the field to announce.
Returns:
The byte length of an announcement for the field of the given name.

updatePrefix

public static void updatePrefix(java.io.DataOutputStream s,
                                byte id,
                                byte length)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Writes a update frame prefix to the given DataOutputStream. Data of the indicated length must follow, otherwise the resulting data stream will be inconsistent!

Parameters:
s - The stream to write to.
id - The ID which the field is associated with.
length - The length of the following data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getUpdateLength

public static int getUpdateLength(int dataLen)
Returns the expected length of a complete update frame (prefix + data).

Parameters:
dataLen - The length of the data included in the update.
Returns:
The length, in bytes, of the complete update frame.

announceProfile

public static void announceProfile(java.io.DataOutputStream s,
                                   java.lang.String name)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Informs the client as to which GUI profile should be loaded and used. This has not yet been implemented on the client!

Parameters:
s - The stream to write to.
name - The name of the profile to load.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getAnnounceProfileLength

public static int getAnnounceProfileLength(java.lang.String name)
Returns the expected length of a profile announcement frame.

Parameters:
name - The name of the profile to be announced.
Returns:
The length, in bytes, of the profile announcement frame.
